text: Answer: 66666.67 Solution: Total memory reference = 10Â° Total miss = 10% = 100000 Increasing associativity decrease conflict. Increasing capacity decrease capacity misses. 1/3+1/3 = 2/3/ of misses can be reduced. The only miss you cannot able to reduce is compulsory miss. Total miss reduced= (2/3) * 100000 = 66666.67...
